EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.Post-event email 8-16-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending SpringOne Platform 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]>
Bring SpringOne Platform Home
With 2000+ attendees, 163 talks, 184 speakers, 17 keynotes, and 37 sponsors, SpringOne Platform 2016 was electric!
For the first time a community of Spring, Cloud Foundry, Data and Agile technologists came together to share insights, stories, collaborations, and use cases on the modern software and modern practices that are fundamentally transforming businesses everywhere.
Thank you for being part of it!
There is more to say and more to come… Follow @Spring1Platform <[[http://twitter.com/spring1platform]]> to find out about next year’s venue and dates!
All of the early access recordings <[[https://www.infoq.com/conferences/springone-platform-2016]]> for event attendees are ready! (access instructions have already been sent to you). Subscribe to Pivotal’s YouTube playlist <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx]]> to be notified when new and public recordings become available. And catch up through our daily wraps from Mon <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/springone-platform-a-movement-comes-of-age]]>, Tues <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/taking-on-the-monolith-with-people-and-tech-springone-platform-day-2]]>, Wed <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/features/positive-sum-software-springs-new-bounce-springone-platform-day-3]]>, Thurs <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/final-call-parting-shots-from-springone-platform]]>, event photos <[[https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.591148844380472.1073741848.161112704050757&type=1&l=8a2006d93b]]>, thoughts <[[https://spring.io/blog/2016/08/03/springone-platform-2016-recap-day-2]]> from Spring Twitterati, and presentation slides—all available for you to share. Also, check out Ovum research’s free report <[[https://pivotal.io/spring-boot-simplifies-end-to-end-development/springone-platform]]> on Spring Boot!
Want to interact, or just dive deeper?
Get started with Spring <[[http://spring.io/guides]]>
Dig Deeper into Pivotal GemFire <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/case-studies/four-real-world-use-cases-for-an-in-memory-data-grid]]>
Get started with Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry]]>
Engage with Pivotal <[[https://pivotal.io/get-started]]>
We hope to see you next year, The Pivotal <[[http://pivotal.io]]> team
